sentences.sContent: Now run along, and don’t get into mischief .
They’ve got enough toys to keep them out of mischief for a while.
sentences.sCn: 他们有足够的玩具玩，暂时不会捣蛋。

sentences.sContent: If you can’t see Nick, you can be sure he’s up to some mischief (= behaving badly and causing trouble or damage ) .
sentences.sCn: 要是看不到尼克，就可以肯定他又在捣什么鬼了。

trans.tranOther: bad behaviour, especially by children, that causes trouble or damage, but no serious harm
